Package de.fu.junction.data

“Java Functions you missed” – Collection of useful functions such as S#implode(String, Object[])] (known from PHP).

See:
          Description

Class Summary
EMailAddress Representation of an email address (like URL for URLs).
Password A Password.
Range Deprecated.
 

Exception Summary
InvalidSyntaxException Thrown to indicate invalid syntax.
MalformedEMailAddressException Thrown to indicate that an email address is malformed.
MalformedHostnameException Thrown to indicate that the hostname portion of an email address is invalid.
MalformedMailboxPartException Thrown to indicate that the mailbox part of an email address is malformed.
 

Package de.fu.junction.data Description

“Java Functions you missed” – Collection of useful functions such as S#implode(String, Object[])] (known from PHP).

Junction consists of classes which provide static methods and thereby act as some kind of function library. Besides the classes in the base package, there are the following sub-packages:

  • de.fu.junction.functional Useful functions and tools known from functional programming languages, such as the higher-order functions map and fold
  • de.fu.junction.converter Some classes for converting Strings into arbitrary datatypes, such as Date.
